content.prompt: Which of the following most directly hindered the expansion of the settlement depicted on the map?

choices.label: The strength of the neighboring Native American confederation
The lack of reliable access to European markets
The frequent attacks by French and Dutch competitors
The scarcity of available land to cultivate crops

topic.text: 2.5: Interactions Between American Indians and Europeans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
